scripts.build: npm run build-bare && npm run build-translations-only && npm run build-full
scripts.build-bare: browserify --bare --standalone PBrute --exclude data/owasp-top-10000.js --exclude lib/i18n.json -o dist/bare.js lib/index.js && terser --compress --mangle --output dist/bare.min.js dist/bare.js
scripts.build-translations-only: browserify --bare --standalone PBrute --exclude data/owasp-top-10000.js -o dist/translations-only.js lib/index.js && terser --compress --mangle --output dist/translations-only.min.js dist/translations-only.js
scripts.build-full: browserify --bare --standalone PBrute -o dist/full.js lib/index.js && terser --compress --mangle --output dist/full.min.js dist/full.js
